title: Episode 31: The Walls of Mantua
description:
The Army of Italy pushes north to support a French offensive in Germany, but finds Wurmser already back on the march, leading to a major battle at Bassano and a frantic race down from the Alps. Conditions within Mantua worsen. We meet a young, capable Austrian commander: Archduke Charles.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
